alert.note: Alert for Fond Du Lac; Ozaukee; Sheboygan (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 11:25PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Ozaukee, Fond du Lac and Sheboygan Counties through 1230 AM CDT... At 1124 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Chilton to near Rosendale. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sheboygan, Fond Du Lac, Plymouth, Sheboygan Falls, North Fond Du Lac, Howards Grove, Oostburg, Belgium, Kohler, Cedar Grove, Random Lake, Rosendale, Elkhart Lake, Southern Lake Winnebago, Taycheedah, Lamartine, Greenbush, Eldorado, Eden, and Mount Calvary. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 151 between mile markers 156 and 163, and between mile markers 165 and 169. Interstate 43 between mile markers 108 and 135. Interstate 41 between mile markers 92 and 109. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
